thread.title: Russia says 23 British diplomats must leave within a week

title: Russia says 23 British diplomats must leave within a week
text: March 17, 2018 / 8:40 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago Russia says 23 British diplomats must leave within a week Reuters Staff 1 Min Read MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russia has decided to expel 23 British diplomats who must leave Moscow within a week, its foreign ministry said on Saturday, after a meeting with Britain’s ambassador to Russia, Laurie Bristow. British Ambassador to Russia Laurie Bristow leaves the Russian Foreign Ministry in Moscow, Russia March 17, 2018. REUTERS/Gleb Garanich In retaliation for British Prime Minister Theresa May’s decision to kick out 23 Russians, Moscow has also decided to close the British Council in Russia and to withdraw permission for Britain to open a general consulate in St Petersburg, the ministry said in a statement. Reporting by Polina Devitt;
